title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: When deleting items from the Coolbar, the layout gets corrupted.
OB: Pressing the Delete button results in the first item on the second row being deleted. The second row is also removed along with the deleted item.
EB: Pressing the Delete button should only delete the first item on the second row, without affecting the layout of the Coolbar. The second row should remain.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the Coolbar section.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Verify that the first item on the second row is deleted, but the layout remains intact.
